com.github.thunder413.netrequest

Class NetRequestTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<com.github.thunder413.netrequest.utils.HttpRequest,java.lang.Void,NetErrorStatus>
      • com.github.thunder413.netrequest.NetRequestTask

  • public class NetRequestTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<com.github.thunder413.netrequest.utils.HttpRequest,java.lang.Void,NetErrorStatus>
    NetRequestTask

    Executes the HTTP request passed as argument and sends the result to the listener according to result status if RequestStatus#SUCCESS it will trigger the {OnNetResponse#onResponseCompleted} method otherwise {OnNetResponse#onResponseError}
